explanation: [0-0] On the ground paved with gray stone bricks, there are a few mossy stone walls.

[0-2] Then a cartoon character wearing a turquoise top and dark blue pants walks out, its mouth wide open in surprise. The scene then switches to a sea of magma, where a Toilet Man head appears on a gray brick, grinning. Below it is a gray chat bubble icon.

[2-4] Next, a cartoon character in a suit and wearing a camera on its head appears, standing on a gray brick with a blue thumbs-up icon on it.

[4-6] Then a wooden sign appears in front of the magma, with the words "Only Choose One" written on it. Below the sign is a blue upward arrow.

[8-13] Then the inventory bar disappears, and a pink dialogue box appears in front of the character. On the left side of the dialogue box is the Cameraman standing on the thumbs-up icon, and on the right side is the Toilet Man head standing on the chat bubble icon. In the middle are the yellow word "or" and a mouse pointer. The number changes from 3 to 2, then to 1, with the pointer pointing to the thumbs-up icon on the left.
